queries.query: Compare HNSW vs IVF indexes for 50 million vectors
queries.ground_truth: HNSW provides 95%+ recall with higher memory usage. IVF_PQ uses less memory but has 85-90% recall. For 50M vectors with sufficient RAM, HNSW is recommended.

queries.query: Best practices for chunking PDF documents
queries.ground_truth: Use page-level chunking for PDFs with clear sections. For dense text, use recursive chunking with 512 tokens and 50 token overlap.
